key: There are no login schemes configured for this client.
value: There are no login schemes configured for this client.

key: Would you like to logout of IdentityServer?
value: Would you like to logout of IdentityServer?

key: Click here to return to the {1} application.
value: Click here to return to the {1} application.

value: Uncheck the permissions you do not wish to grant.

value: You have successfully authorized the device

value: Please enter the code displayed on your device

value: You are now being returned to the application.

value: Once complete, you may close this tab

key: The {0} must be at least {2} and at max {1} characters long.
value: The {0} must be at least {2} and at max {1} characters long.

key: The new password and confirmation password do not match.
value: The new password and confirmation password do not match.

key: Deleting this data will permanently remove your account, and this cannot be recovered.
value: Deleting this data will permanently remove your account, and this cannot be recovered.

key: Delete data and close my account
value: Delete data and close my account

key: Disabling 2FA does not change the keys used in authenticator apps. If you wish to change the key used in an authenticator app you should reset your authenticator keys.
value: Disabling 2FA does not change the keys used in authenticator apps. If you wish to change the key used in an authenticator app you should reset your authenticator keys.

key: 2fa has been disabled. You can reenable 2fa when you setup an authenticator app
value: 2fa has been disabled. You can reenable 2fa when you setup an authenticator app

key: Please confirm your account by clicking here.
value: Please confirm your account by clicking here.

key: Confirmation link to change email sent. Please check your email.
value: Confirmation link to change email sent. Please check your email.

key: Verification email sent. Please check your email.
value: Verification email sent. Please check your email.

key: To use an authenticator app go through the following steps:
value: To use an authenticator app go through the following steps:

key: Download a two-factor authenticator app like Microsoft Authenticator for Windows Phone, Android and iOS or Google Authenticator for Android and iOS.
value: Download a two-factor authenticator app like Microsoft Authenticator for Windows Phone, Android and iOS or Google Authenticator for Android and iOS.

key: Scan the QR Code or enter this key <kbd>{0}</kbd> into your two factor authenticator app. Spaces and casing do not matter.
value: Scan the QR Code or enter this key <kbd>{0}</kbd> into your two factor authenticator app. Spaces and casing do not matter.

key: Once you have scanned the QR code or input the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide youm with a unique code.Enter the code in the confirmation box below.
value: Once you have scanned the QR code or input the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide youm with a unique code.Enter the code in the confirmation box below.

key: Your authenticator app has been verified.
value: Your authenticator app has been verified.

key: Remove this {0} login from your account
value: Remove this {0} login from your account

key: The external login was not added. External logins can only be associated with one account.
value: The external login was not added. External logins can only be associated with one account.

key: The external login was not removed.
value: The external login was not removed.

key: Put these codes in a safe place.
value: Put these codes in a safe place.

key: If you lose your device and don't have the recovery codes you will lose access to your account.
value: If you lose your device and don't have the recovery codes you will lose access to your account.

key: Generating new recovery codes does not change the keys used in authenticator apps. If you wish to change the key used in an authenticator app you should reset your authenticator keys.
value: Generating new recovery codes does not change the keys used in authenticator apps. If you wish to change the key used in an authenticator app you should reset your authenticator keys.

key: You have generated new recovery codes.
value: You have generated new recovery codes.

key: Below is the list of applications you have given access to and the names of the resources they have access to.
value: Below is the list of applications you have given access to and the names of the resources they have access to.

key: You have not given access to any applications
value: You have not given access to any applications

key: Unexpected error when trying to set phone number.
value: Unexpected error when trying to set phone number.

key: Your account contains personal data that you have given us. This page allows you to download or delete that data.
value: Your account contains personal data that you have given us. This page allows you to download or delete that data.

key: Deleting this data will permanently remove your account, and this cannot be recovered.
value: Deleting this data will permanently remove your account, and this cannot be recovered.

key: If you reset your authenticator key your authenticator app will not work until you reconfigure it.
value: If you reset your authenticator key your authenticator app will not work until you reconfigure it.

key: This process disables 2FA until you verify your authenticator app. If you do not complete your authenticator app configuration you may lose access to your account.
value: This process disables 2FA until you verify your authenticator app. If you do not complete your authenticator app configuration you may lose access to your account.

key: Your authenticator app key has been reset, you will need to configure your authenticator app using the new key.
value: Your authenticator app key has been reset, you will need to configure your authenticator app using the new key.

key: You do not have a local username/password for this site. Add a local account so you can log in without an external login.
value: You do not have a local username/password for this site. Add a local account so you can log in without an external login.

key: You have no recovery codes left.
value: You have no recovery codes left.

key: You must generate a new set of recovery codes before you can log in with a recovery code.
value: You must generate a new set of recovery codes before you can log in with a recovery code.

key: You can generate a new set of recovery codes.
value: You can generate a new set of recovery codes.

key: You should generate a new set of recovery codes.
value: You should generate a new set of recovery codes.

key: The current browser has been forgotten. When you login again from this browser you will be prompted for your 2fa code.
value: The current browser has been forgotten. When you login again from this browser you will be prompted for your 2fa code.

key: Thank you for confirming your email.
value: Thank you for confirming your email.

key: Thank you for confirming your email change.
value: Thank you for confirming your email change.

value: You've successfully authenticated with {0}. Please enter an email address for this site below and click the Register button to finish logging in.

value: Error loading external login information during confirmation.

value: Please reset your password by clicking here.

key: Please check your email to reset your password.
value: Please check your email to reset your password.

key: Your login is protected with an authenticator app. Enter your authenticator code below.
value: Your login is protected with an authenticator app. Enter your authenticator code below.

key: Don't have access to your authenticator device? You can log in with a recovery code.
value: Don't have access to your authenticator device? You can log in with a recovery code.

key: You have requested to log in with a recovery code. This login will not be remembered until you provide an authenticator app code at log in or disable 2FA and log in again.
value: You have requested to log in with a recovery code. This login will not be remembered until you provide an authenticator app code at log in or disable 2FA and log in again.

key: Please check your email to confirm your account.
value: Please check your email to confirm your account.
